about_the_game:
RPG Orchestral Essentials Reborn is a massive collection of 41 high-quality and royalty-free orchestral music tracks covering every essential theme, suitable for RPGs, JRPGs and more!

Composed by Jonathan Shaw and inspired by classics such as Golden Sun, Fire Emblem, Octopath, and NieR, each of the tracks loops seamlessly at least once in the recording, and then ends abruptly with natural trailing reverberation, allowing you to either set seamless loop points (using the metadata values embedded within the OGG files) or match the tracks to conclude dramatically with cutscenes, offering substantial utility!

Features:

* 41 BGM orchestral tracks covering every essential theme and more!
* Over 100 minutes of original music!
* Royalty-free to use in both commercial and non-commercial projects!
* Given in high-quality WAV, OGG, M4A and MP3 files!

Tracklist:

01 – A Slave To No One
02 – Treading the Unknown
03 – In Tranquil Spring
04 – The Tread of War
05 – Morning Frost
06 – Spinning Tavern
07 – Heated Lands
08 – A Tale of Wind
09 – A Tale of Water
10 – A Fight in the Fields
11 – Training is Over
12 – A Dream of First Flight
13 – Cold Sanctuary
14 – A Bitter Hope
15 – Can’t Stop Winning
16 – Out of Time
17 – The Precipice of Victory
18 – Visions of Freedom
19 – The World At Your Door
20 – The Fallen
21 – Memories of a Lost Autumn
22 – Market on the Sea
23 – A Tale of Peace
24 – Encounter of Misdeeds
25 – Land of Misdeeds
26 – Showdown of Misdeeds
27 – Thoughts
28 – Midnight Creeping
29 – Wipe Away Those Tears
30 – Battle for Mana
31 – Afternoon Chat
32 – Checking Inventory
33 – Tomorrow, We Ride
34 – Tomorrow, We Die
35 – Hear Our Prayer
36 – Lingering Evil
37 – The People’s Parade
38 – The Tread of Day
39 – The Tread of Soldiers
40 – Sinning Tavern
41 – Welcome to the Club

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
